content: The most important thing in the Olympic Games is not to win but to take part, just as the most important thing in life is not the triumph but the struggle. The essential thing is not to have conquered but to have fought well.
translations: ita:La cosa più importante nei Giochi Olimpici non è vincere ma partecipare, così come nella vita la cosa più importante non
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Objectivesea (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
